abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Adds a poison effect to Viper's attack, slowing enemy movement speed, reducing their magic resistance, and causing damage over time.
abilities.notes: Stacks independently. Attacking a target refreshes the duration on all stacks.

abilities.name: Nethertoxin
abilities.description: Creates a pool of Nethertoxin at a target location that deals increasing magical damage over time and reduces attack speed of enemies inside.
abilities.notes: Damage ramps up over time, reaching maximum damage after 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.description: Causes damage to those who attack Viper while also slowing their attack speed. Meanwhile, Viper gains increased magic resistance.
abilities.notes: Only triggered when enemies damage Viper with attacks or spells.

abilities.name: Viper Strike
abilities.description: Strikes an enemy with venom, slowing movement and attack speed while dealing damage over time.
abilities.notes: Can be upgraded with Aghanim's Scepter to reduce cooldown and allow multiple casts.

innate_abilities.name: Predator
innate_abilities.description: Viper's attacks deal additional physical damage based on the target's current health and Viper's level.
innate_abilities.notes: Damage calculation: (Base Factor + Level Factor * Viper's Level) * Target's Current HP
